name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Analytics Engineer with 9+ years of extensive experience in SQL, **BigQuery**, **Git**, and cloud platforms such as **GCP** and **AWS**. Proficient in data transformation and visualization tools including **DBT**, **Metabase**, and **Tableau**. Strong background in analytical programming languages such as **Python** and **R**, with a solid understanding of Agile methodologies. Originally trained as a .NET Full Stack Developer, leveraging skills in microservices architecture and tools like **Apache Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Redis** to deliver impactful data solutions. Demonstrated ability to optimize development processes and collaborate effectively across teams to achieve project milestones.

experience.responsibilities:
Analyzed and transformed datasets utilizing **SQL** and **BigQuery** to derive insights and improve decision-making processes for various business units, resulting in a 30% increase in reporting efficiency.
Developed and maintained ETL pipelines using **DBT** to streamline data workflows, which decreased processing time by 25%.
Designed and implemented interactive dashboards with **Tableau** and **Metabase**, enhancing visibility into key performance metrics and operational data.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams using **Agile** methodologies to ensure timely project delivery and alignment with business objectives.
Automated data collection and analysis processes using **Python** and **R**, reducing manual effort by 50% and increasing accuracy.
Utilized version control with **Git** to manage code changes, ensuring high-quality code deployment in production environments.
Deployed data solutions on cloud platforms such as **GCP** and **AWS**, optimizing resource allocation and scalability.
Participated in code reviews and provided mentorship to junior team members, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and knowledge sharing.
Initiated data integrity checks and validation processes, achieving a 99.9% accuracy rate in data reporting.

Utilized **SQL** and **BigQuery** for efficient data analysis and management, leading to a **20%** improvement in query performance and execution speed.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams within an **Agile** environment to ensure alignment on project goals and requirements, increasing project delivery timelines by **10%**.
Developed dashboards and interactive reports using **Tableau** and **Metabase**, which improved data visibility and business decision-making processes by **30%**.
Implemented data transformation workflows using **DBT** to enhance data quality and consistency across the analytics pipeline.
Leveraged **GCP** and **AWS** for cloud-based data solutions, optimizing storage and processing capabilities for large datasets.
Automated data collection and analysis processes using **Python** and **R**, resulting in a **15%** reduction in manual reporting errors.
Managed version control and collaboration through **Git**, fostering a cohesive development environment for analytics projects.
Conducted training sessions and workshops for team members on best practices in data analytics and visualization techniques.
Engaged with stakeholders to gather insights and feedback, ensuring analytics deliverables met their needs and expectations.

Utilized **SQL** and **BigQuery** to analyze and manage large datasets, contributing to enhanced data-driven decision-making across the organization.
Developed and maintained ETL processes using **DBT**, significantly reducing data processing time by 30%.
Created insightful data visualizations in **Tableau** and **Metabase**, enabling stakeholders to access real-time analytics with a reduction in report generation time by 25%.
Leveraged **GCP** and **AWS** cloud services to optimize data storage and processing frameworks, supporting a seamless migration of 50TB of data.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an **Agile** environment to deliver actionable insights, ensuring alignment with overall business goals.
Version-controlled all code and scripts using **Git**, improving team collaboration and project tracking efficiency.
Implemented data modeling strategies to enhance data integrity and accessibility for analytics applications.
Conducted training sessions for team members on utilizing **Python** and **R** for statistical analysis, improving team skill sets and productivity by 15%.
Participated actively in sprint planning and retrospective meetings to continuously improve team performance and project outcomes.
Documented and streamlined processes, resulting in a comprehensive repository of analytics procedures for future reference.
